cab.content: s f c r f t.L^rCvy-^t /Ismbattle situation - morning -10th may, 1916.1. counter attacks delivered, yesterday evening recaptured the small portion of our front trench north-west of albert gained by the enemy as a result of his attack yesterday morning. there have been no further developments in the fighting north of kemmel..2. as far as is known at present no attacks have developed this morning, and the situation remains unchanged.general staff,war office, s.w.i.10th may, 1910.issued at 1 p.rn.
